Message: At first, it was my parents.

As she lay on the floor,
my mother cried until
her very last breath...

“This is all a dream.
My child would never
do something so vile...
It’s just a dream...”
But, to say goodbye like this...

This demon is trying
to crush my heart...

As I resist,
more and more
lives are lost.

“No, I don’t want to die...!
Save me...”

Nothing you do will ever
make me give up!

I’ll keep fighting until
I’ve stopped you!
You can crush my heart
as much as you like,

but my rage will
never die out!

Something like you can
never destroy my soul!!
